name: Passport to Prague
overview: An interactive street map application for the PlayStation Portable. The UMD release features city maps of metropolitan districts (one for each European city released separately on disc for the EUR version), with streets, detailed building location markers, hotspot locations (including dining, shops, sight-seeing areas, plus more) and many other details for easy city running. Maps can be zoomed and rotated in any direction. You can mark your own My Spot locations, dotting your map with up to 400 spots, and can trade My Spots with other PSPs via wireless link (ad-hoc). Users can also connect online to download updated info and extensive markings for different locations.
